name: Make Border Great Again!
description:
Do you have problems at the border? Your burgers and hot dogs always want to steal? Do not worry, citizens. The Borderman will help you!
This brave Superhero knows a lot about defending the borders!
His motto: Make border great again!
And now, feel yourself a Superhero The Borderman!

What does it mean?
- get various funny superheroes;
- create your own strategy to protect borders;
- meet the waves of many enemies;
- enjoy of fun cartoon-like graphics and humor!
